The company aims to amplify human sellers with AI, not replace them, and has seen a 300% year-over-year growth in annual recurring revenue.

title: Signal is the No. 1 downloaded app in the Netherlands. But why?

customer_insights: Dutch users are increasingly concerned about data privacy and are seeking alternatives to mainstream messaging apps due to distrust of Big Tech and recent U.S. political developments. Increased media coverage and public debate have fueled interest in privacy-friendly options.
